document.full_text: the l.a. galaxy got off to a winning start to the new mls season with a 1-0 victory at the seattle sounders in the north american league's opening game on tuesday.
document.title: galaxy get winning start at seattle
lines_and_colors: the l.a. galaxy got off to a winning start to the new mls season with a 1-0 victory at the seattle sounders in the north american league's opening game on tuesday.
